title: Pork schnitzel with parsley sauce
description: You'll have to fry the schnitzels in batches so keep them warm in a large roasting pan in a low oven as they're cooked.
ingredients: sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
4kg/9lb pork escalopes, each about 100g/3½oz, beaten flat
200ml/7fl oz sunflower oil, for shallow frying
large bunch curly parsley, finely chopped
